item.description:
This is a joint event with the Providence Winos meetup.com group.

Maura, of Providence Winos, and I hope that you are able to join us for a lovely evening with wine and food at the Bolivian/Peruvian restaurant, Los Andes. The food here is seriously delicious, and you will not want to miss this event!

Wine
You may order off the wine list at the restaurant, or you may bring a bottle of wine to share with the group. If you BYOB, it's not necessary to purchase an expensive bottle, and we think it would be fun if the wine was from South America, to keep within the theme of the restaurant.

Dinner
You can order off the menu or take advantage of the prix-fixe menu the restaurant has exclusively offered the two meetup groups. It is $19.95 and includes a choice of appetizer, a choice of entree, and flan for dessert.

You can get more information about the restaurant at http://www.losandesri... - hope to see you there!


Special thanks to John Taraborelli, from Providence Monthly, for helping us put these details together.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for Maura, Malyna, or Newcomers meetup
item.name: Wine & Dinner @ Los Andes
